property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegades find ever more creative ways to work around the Consulate's aether regulations.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dwarves have an instinct for repair, an inherent understanding of how systems work, and a reputation for fearlessness. They're perfect candidates for the Fair's emergency response team.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Aetherstorm Roc or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter). Whenever Aetherstorm Roc attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it and tap up to one target creature defending player controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, vigilance, lifelink Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Other creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Citizens are free to do as they wish, within the confines of the Consulate's laws.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aviary Mechanic enters the battlefield, you may return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pilots take crippled skyships to the Aviaries, trusting Ghirapur's most talented mechanics to get them back into the air.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate-built automatons have a lifetime warranty.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature you don't control Enchanted creature can't attack. Whenever an opponent casts a spell, if it has a single target, change the target to enchanted creature if able.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "At last, the infamous Pia Nalaar." - Tezzeret

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Consulate Surveillance enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by a source of your choice.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Consul's Shieldguard enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Consul's Shieldguard attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Eddytrail Hawk enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Eddytrail Hawk attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, another target attacking creature gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fairgrounds Warden enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Fairgrounds Warden leaves the battlefield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment with mana value 4 or less.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Too much friction on your bearings, your countersinking is inconsistent, and there are lines in your casting. Dispose of it, and begin again." - Dovin Baan

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy all creatures. You gain 1 life for each creature destroyed this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Ghirapur's gremlin population poses a threat to the infrastructure of the fairgrounds. Threats must be eliminated." - Sram, senior edificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike Whenever Gearshift Ace crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some display their trophies at the Hall of Mechanists. Others display their talent in the streets of Ghirapur.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Herald of the Fair enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Welcome, one and all! Right this way! Open your eyes, your ears, and your imaginations to the wonders of the Inventors' Fair!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: Impeccable Timing deals 3 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When Baral constructed his trap for Chandra, he did not account for the arrival of an enormous leonin wielding a twin-headed axe.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: One dwarf on a build team ensures competence. All dwarves on the team ensures brilliance.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Servos and Thopters you control get +1/+1. {3}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let us never forget the joy that lies at the heart of invention."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another creature you control leaves the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Ninth Bridge Patrol.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate keeps watch at each of the eleven bridges to ensure that the market remains a haven for commerce, not for con artists.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Tap target creature. Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sky isn't the limit. It's the starting point."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's no reason to buy a new one when I've got the tools to fix the one you've got." - Ripu, repair specialist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack, block, or crew Vehicles.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "By order of Consulate Mandate 482, I am required to detain you, citizen."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The judges really put them through their paces, but they prevailed. I think they even impressed Head Judge Tezzeret." - Ritika, artificer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The great birds dive through the sky, wings skimming the aether streams, to fall upon their unsuspecting prey.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature with power 3 or greater. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In the moment of truth, it is as though time stands still, and the whale waits, suspended in the sky.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There is no dress code for the Inventors' Fair, but you'll be hard-pressed to find anyone or anything not done up in their finest.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thriving Ibex enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Ibex attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Textiles at the Inventors' Fair feature threads from every corner of Kaladesh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control an artifact, Toolcraft Exemplar gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If you control three or more artifacts, it also gains first strike until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you wish to produce the finest work, you must start with the finest tools."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vigilance Trusty Companion can't attack alone.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It shows affection an automaton never could.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a multifunctional radial extension system with superlateral, force-amplifying rigging. Of course it will win."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Wispweaver Angel enters the battlefield, you may exile another target creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Enchant creature or Vehicle When Aether Meltdown enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Enchanted creature gets -4/-0.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aether Theorist enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target permanent you control and target permanent you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate engineers have developed safe methods of harvesting aether, but renegades aren't always so careful.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay eight {E}: Return all other creatures to their owners' hands. Activate only as a sorcery.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The judges at the Fair are held in such high esteem that a nod of recognition can inspire an inventor for a lifetime - and a wave of dismissal can end a career.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target artifact or creature. You get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters), then you may pay an amount of {E} equal to that permanent's mana value. If you do, gain control of it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Citizens, do not resist. This is for your safety. Tezzeret bids you to surrender your inventions. Now."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Step right up! Try your hand! It'll thrill the senses and boggle the mind!"

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand. Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Baral took my family from me back then. I'd do anything to face him now." - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all nonland permanents you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nobody asked you to butt in, Jace. But thanks." - Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact or Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay six {E}, Sacrifice Era of Innovation: Draw three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Experimental Aviator enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature tokens with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The little thopters seemed lonely up here, so I thought I'd join them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target spell. Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The most dangerous thing an artificer can do is believe an invention is perfect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each artifact you control. {5}{U}: Gearseeker Serpent can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its collection is vast, yet each ship has a special place in its heart.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scry 2, then draw two cards. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Creators live for that moment of inspiration: precious, profound, perfect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Glint-Nest Crane enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an artifact card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender When Hightide Hermit enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Hightide Hermit can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Counter target spell. • You may choose new targets for target spell. • Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We meet again, pyromancer." - Baral, Chief of Compliance

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Janjeet Sentry enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}{E}: You may tap or untap target artifact or creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Janjeet Observatory is open to the public, but access to the adjoining laboratories is restricted.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Long-Finned Skywhale can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The aethersphere is home to the most wondrous beings on all of Kaladesh, although the dangers of traversing it mean that not much is known of them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant artifact or creature When Malfunction enters the battlefield, tap enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They don't make them like they used to."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is that spell's mana value. {3}{U}{U}, Exile Metallurgic Summonings: Return all instant and sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only if you control six or more artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Minister of Inquiries enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}: Target player mills three cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Nimble Innovator enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "A failure is simply another opportunity for improvement. Just wait until you see what I come up with next."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifacts you control have hexproof. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control the artifact with the highest mana value or tied for the highest mana value, draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return any number of target nonland, nontoken permanents you control to their owners' hands. Draw a card for each card returned to your hand this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The results of Rashmi's experimentation forced her to consider the possibility that multitudinous realities existed beyond her own.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Counter target nonartifact spell unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: By the time a Consulate sanction becomes official, the renegade quicksmiths have already found a way to circumvent it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Create a token that's a copy of target artifact. • Create a token that's a copy of target creature, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the first touch, I know exactly what the metal wants to be."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return target tapped creature to its owner's hand. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exchange control of target artifact you control and target artifact or creature you don't control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Draw three cards. If you control no artifacts, discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To achieve what none have achieved before, one must dare what none have dared before."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thriving Turtle enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Turtle attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aether shapes everything on Kaladesh, from the sky to the sea.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash When Torrential Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may cast target instant card from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If that spell would be put into your graveyard, exile it instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prowess (Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, this creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vedalken have six thin, agile fingers on each hand, giving them unparalleled dexterity.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Weldfast Wingsmith gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Airships are too confining. If I'm in the sky, I want to feel the wind in my hair and taste the aether."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Drakes prowl the skies of Kaladesh, waiting for the perfect moment to strike.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, lifelink When Aetherborn Marauder enters the battlefield, move any number of +1/+1 counters from other permanents you control onto Aetherborn Marauder.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I don't know what that is or who it belongs to, but it's shiny and I want it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aetherborn who are unwilling to accept the decomposition of their bodies invent ways to preserve and augment themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Demon of Dark Schemes enters the battlefield, all other creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. Whenever another creature dies, you get {E} (an energy counter). {2}{B}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control tapped.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control an artifact, Dhund Operative gets +1/+0 and has deathtouch.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baral's spies always have the latest technology.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Show them. Show them how hot your fire can burn." - Liliana Vess, to Chandra Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. The creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each {E} paid this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When the time comes, let go. Nothing lasts forever."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Dukhara Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may put target artifact or creature card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice X creatures. Destroy X target creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Open hostilities are strictly forbidden at the Inventors' Fair, but "accidents" still happen.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Embraal Bruiser enters the battlefield tapped. Embraal Bruiser has menace as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Embraal, inventor gangs defend their turf with ingenious devices and blunt objects.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Essence Extraction deals 3 damage to target creature and you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The "gifted" among the aetherborn can draw the life essence of other living beings into themselves.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Return target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand. • Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An aetherborn wastes neither time nor treasure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Foundry Screecher gets +1/+0 as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My creations still can't match the dive speed of those floppy-winged mammals. Maybe I should enter one of them in the Fair." - Viprikti, thopterist

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fretwork Colony can't block. At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Fretwork Colony and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The swarm leaves behind a flawless pattern that only occasionally threatens the structural integrity of the wood.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deathtouch When Gonti, Lord of Luxury enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of target opponent's library, exile one of them face down, then put the rest on the bottom of that library in a random order. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature card from it. That player discards that card. Scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you've done nothing wrong, you have nothing to fear." - Enforcer-Chief Ranaj

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Lawless Broker dies, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kaladesh's illicit marketplaces are known as "night markets," but if you know who to ask, you can find what you're looking for at any time of the day.

property.name: Rules
property.value: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, and get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you have the chance, take it. Laugh, sing, dance. Don't allow the night to end."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose a nonartifact, nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. That player shuffles, then draws a card for each card exiled from their hand this way.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "That name shall not be spoken." - Baral, Chief of Compliance

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 3 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put three +1/+1 counters on it or create three 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Whenever an artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, target opponent loses life equal to Marionette Master's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Midnight Oil enters the battlefield with seven hour counters on it. At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card and remove two hour counters from Midnight Oil. Your maximum hand size is equal to the number of hour counters on Midnight Oil. Whenever you discard a card, you lose 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many an inventor has collapsed under the pressure to create a flawless design.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact or creature. Draw cards equal to the mana value of the sacrificed permanent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Every creation carries a piece of its creators. Their knowledge, their dreams, their soul. That is the best part."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Night Market Lookout becomes tapped, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate rarely cracks the coded announcement of a night market's location before dawn, and enforcers are taken care of if they wander too close.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace When Noxious Gearhulk enters the battlefield, you may destroy another target creature. If a creature is destroyed this way, you gain life equal to its toughness.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Ovalchase Daredevil from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let me guess. You thought I was dead."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's rare that the Prakhata Club closes its doors. It's also rare that Lord Gonti meets with Consul Kambal. What are the odds the two would occur on the same day?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains lifelink and indestructible until end of turn. (Damage dealt by that creature also causes its controller to gain that much life, and it can't be destroyed by damage or effects that say "destroy.")

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Short lives lead to forbidden choices.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one or both - • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Renegades do some of their best work right under the Consulate's nose.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Put a +1/+1 counter on Syndicate Trafficker. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The price isn't negotiable, but I'm sure you'll agree it's fair."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thriving Rats enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Rats attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: In Ghirapur, even the lowliest residents live in lavish surroundings.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. You gain 1 life for each artifact you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Aetherborn patrons use any means necessary to secure victory for their protégés.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. {1}{B}, Sacrifice Underhanded Designs: Destroy target creature. Activate only if you control two or more artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No, I don't believe they have the proper permits for those, but I'm not going to be the one to ask." - Caru, Consulate warden

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aethertorch Renegade enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E}{E} (four energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}{E}: Aethertorch Renegade deals 1 damage to target creature. {T}, Pay eight {E}: Aethertorch Renegade deals 6 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Driven by an insatiable hunger, gremlins never cease feeding. They can destroy a lifetime of work in just a few moments.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target attacking creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If it's an artifact creature, it gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Free from Consulate regulations, renegade-built automatons push performance to the limit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The chasm of years and worlds collapsed under the power of their embrace.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card. If you don't, Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 2 damage to each opponent. [+1]: Add {R}{R}. −3: Chandra, Torch of Defiance deals 4 damage to target creature. −7: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, this emblem deals 5 damage to any target."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Chandra's Pyrohelix deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This one's for my mom, and this one's for me."

property.name: Rules
property.value: First strike When Combustible Gearhulk enters the battlefield, target opponent may have you draw three cards. If the player doesn't, you mill three cards, then Combustible Gearhulk deals damage to that player equal to the total mana value of those cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Most came to Ghirapur for the Fair. Gremlins came for the feast.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fateful Showdown deals damage to any target equal to the number of cards in your hand. Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tonight at the Grand Exhibition, witness Head Judge Tezzeret face off against the infamous renegade Pia Nalaar.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Furious Reprisal deals 2 damage to each of two targets.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Now that's the Chandra I've been waiting to see." - Liliana Vess

property.name: Rules
property.value: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has menace.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant-decorating contest at the migration festival is a tradition that may have started as a dare.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. You get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters), then you may pay any amount of {E}. Harnessed Lightning deals that much damage to that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gain control of target artifact or creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Whoa there. Easy. We're just going to take a little detour."

property.name: Rules
property.value: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Incendiary Sabotage deals 3 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All of those Consulate safety measures undone with one simple tweak."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inventor's Apprentice gets +1/+1 as long as you control an artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Everyone starts off making garbage. If you finally make something halfway decent, it'll be the best day of your life." - Nehra, inventor

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste When Lathnu Hellion enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Lathnu Hellion unless you pay {E}{E}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal an artifact card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Madcap Experiment deals damage to you equal to the number of cards revealed this way.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Maulfist Doorbuster enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Maulfist Doorbuster attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Pia Nalaar enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying. {1}{R}: Target artifact creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Quicksmiths are eager to jump from one project to the next, relying on flashes of inspiration rather than careful research.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Reckless Fireweaver deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Architects find inspiration in the dragon's beauty of form, while artificers are influenced by the function of its fire.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature can't block this turn. Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Nothing against you. It's just that waiting for Consulate clearance was never really my thing."

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{R}, Sacrifice Ruinous Gremlin: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: City officials once sent twenty gleaming automatons to exterminate a nest of gremlins. They soon saw the error of their ways.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, Salivating Gremlins gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If an elf can dream it, a dwarf can build it, and a gremlin can eat it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying {R}: Skyship Stalker gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {R}: Skyship Stalker gains first strike until end of turn. {R}: Skyship Stalker gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose target creature. Exile the top card of your library. You may have Spark of Creativity deal damage to that creature equal to the exiled card's mana value. If you don't, you may play that card until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To invent is to rebel." - Pia Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Speedway Fanatic crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If her vehicle even has a brake, she couldn't tell you which pedal it is.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Spireside Infiltrator becomes tapped, it deals 1 damage to each opponent.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Consulate promised that we would all have access to aether. I'm just keeping them honest."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Spontaneous Artist enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter). Pay {E}: Target creature gains haste until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Graffiti of the "leaking spire" symbol is found wherever the renegades have been.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Vehicles you control become artifact creatures until end of turn. Creatures you control get +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inventors from around the world have come to the Fair hoping their creations will fly, drive, or sail their way to a top prize.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Whenever you get one or more {E} (energy counters), Territorial Gorger gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inventors have been known to capture gremlins with the intent to release them in a rival's workshop. More often than not, that plan backfires.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Consider this a high alert, people. Permission to destroy on sight. Either we take it down or it'll take down the Fair." - Pav, gremlin watch

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thriving Grubs enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The giants follow the flow of aether, and twice a year it leads them through here. Lesson learned. More clearance is needed." - Sram, senior edificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Welding Sparks deals X damage to target creature, where X is 3 plus the number of artifacts you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The fires of invention burn in all of us. I fight for the freedom to unleash those flames." - Pia Nalaar

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd just let the monkey have it if I were you. You can make another, but the same can't be said of your fingers." - Turni, Greenwheel groundskeeper

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Arborback Stomper enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The power of aether draws creatures to it like a magnetic force, and those that are touched by it are forever altered.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Landfall - Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter). Pay eight {E}: Create a 6/6 colorless Beast artifact creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Next to her designs, life seems like a pale imitation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Armorcraft Judge enters the battlefield, draw a card for each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Were she not a judge, she'd win the division herself.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You get {E}{E} (two energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've never seen a world where aether weaves through every aspect of nature."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Those who move harmoniously with the flow of aether can channel the power of the natural world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bristling Hydra enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Bristling Hydra. It gains hexproof until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to players this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Never before have there been so many brilliant minds and wondrous inventions in one place. Denizens from every corner of Kaladesh will flock to the once-in-a-lifetime Inventors' Fair.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Consulate guards who pursue fleeing renegades into the Cowl often become lost - occasionally permanently - in the city's wildest greenbelt.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sanctions, mandates, regulations . . . These things mean nothing to the natural world.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.) Whenever Cultivator of Blades attacks, you may have other attacking creatures get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is Cultivator of Blades's power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top ten cards of your library, exile up to two creature cards from among them, then shuffle. Target opponent may choose one of the exiled cards and put it onto the battlefield under their control. Put the rest onto the battlefield under your control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature. {5}{G}, Sacrifice Durable Handicraft: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Elegant Edgecrafters can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Fabricate 2 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put two +1/+1 counters on it or create two 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature tokens.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of each end step, if a +1/+1 counter was put on a permanent under your control this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Fairgrounds Trumpeter.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The louder the elephant trumpeted, the more the crowd cheered. And the more the crowd cheered . . .

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Target creature you control can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Fairgoers were delighted to find that even outside the fairgrounds, Ghirapur was a city of wonders.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Natural evolution is often at odds with industrial progress.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Kujar Seedsculptor enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Every leaf, tree, and building in Kujar has been placed to achieve maximum harmony, in accordance with the elvish philosophy known as the Great Conduit.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They say Head Judge Tezzeret will be reviewing every invention at the Fair. I made sure to build something that will stand out." - Jehvani, Vahadar artificer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Longtusk Cub deals combat damage to a player, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Pay {E}{E}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Longtusk Cub.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Target creature you control gains vigilance and trample until end of turn. It deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many elves incorporate the beauty of nature into their inventions. Very few capture its savagery.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Untap target land you control. Until your next turn, it becomes a 5/5 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land. −3: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. −6: You get an emblem with "Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap target creature. It gets +1/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Inspired by the thorns and brambles of the untamed wilds, elvish armor is both beautiful and formidable.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {4}{G}, {T}: Create an X/X colorless Construct artifact creature token, where X is the number of creatures you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Inspiration is reciprocal: we all have a responsibility to each other to create."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Connected as artificer and invention, bonded as rider and steed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Riparian Tiger enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Riparian Tiger attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sage of Shaila's Claim enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even now, Shaila's descendants proudly occupy the greenway that she refused to relinquish to the Consulate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Servant of the Conduit enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Creation without connection to nature is just manufacture."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Take Down deals 4 damage to target creature with flying. • Take Down deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The drake flew true. The arrow flew truer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Thriving Rhino enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Thriving Rhino attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As unpredictable as aether, and just as hard to contain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample When Verdurous Gearhulk enters the battlefield, distribute four +1/+1 counters among any number of target creatures you control.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Wild Wanderer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We all began in nature, and nature is where we belong."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Return X target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Wildest Dreams.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I opened my mind to the immensity of the wonders around me. It was only then that I could see the Great Conduit." - Rashmi, aether-seer

property.name: Rules
property.value: {2}{G}: Wily Bandar gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Part feline, part primate, all trouble.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Cloudblazer enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All the aether charts in the world can't compete with the trained eye of a talented scout.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Lifelink Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't waste my time with trifles. Bring me works of art, and I will make you rich."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other Dwarves you control get +1/+1. Each Vehicle you control gets +1/+1 as long as it's a creature. Whenever Depala, Pilot Exemplar becomes tapped, you may pay {X}. If you do, reveal the top X cards of your library, put all Dwarf and Vehicle cards from among them into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Until your next turn, up to one target creature gets -3/-0 and its activated abilities can't be activated. −1: You gain 2 life and draw a card. −7: You get an emblem with "Your opponents can't untap more than two permanents during their untap steps."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying, trample Whenever Empyreal Voyager deals combat damage to a player, you get that many {E} (energy counters).

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "For years, I studied the aethersphere from afar, but it was not until I touched the aether for myself that I came to know the power contained in the swirling sky."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose one - • Target creature gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn. • Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Creatures with no counters on them get -2/-2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are many reasons we invent, of which survival is not the least."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, that player loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He has "friends" in places both high and low, and all seem to owe him favors.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast your first spell each turn, reveal the top card of your library. You may cast it without paying its mana cost if it's a spell with lesser mana value. If you don't cast it, put it into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Restoration Gearsmith enters the battlefield, return target artifact or creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All she touches turns to well-oiled, delicately calibrated, perfectly balanced gold.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+1]: Scry 1. Saheeli Rai deals 1 damage to each opponent. −2: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact or creature you control, except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. That token gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. −7: Search your library for up to three artifact cards with different names, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy target creature. If you control an artifact, Unlicensed Disintegration deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I'd stand back if I were you."

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Veteran Motorist enters the battlefield, scry 2. Whenever Veteran Motorist crews a Vehicle, that Vehicle gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He's set to compete in every race at the Fair, and he plans to win them all.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Voltaic Brawler enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). Whenever Voltaic Brawler attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Whirler Virtuoso enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first tentative flaps are like a song to his soul.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Was it just lonely, or was some form of evolution inevitable?

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast a spell, you gain 1 life for each spell you've cast this turn. Pay 50 life: Aetherflux Reservoir deals 50 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: While most power is used for ordinary, everyday tasks, one shouldn't underestimate its potential for the extraordinary.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a permanent you control is put into a graveyard, you get {E} (an energy counter). {T}, Pay six {E}: Look at the top six cards of your library. You may cast a spell from among them without paying its mana cost. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on a permanent you control, you may pay {1}. If you do, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {3}, {T}: Choose a counter on target permanent or player. Give that permanent or player another counter of that kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Menace Crew 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It glides around the city, a sublime combination of elegance and utility.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Ballista Charger attacks, it deals 1 damage to any target. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {W}: Bastion Mastodon gains vigilance until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Consulate's automaton bank contains only the most impressive specimens.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Bomat Bazaar Barge enters the battlefield, draw a card. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Whenever Bomat Courier attacks, exile the top card of your library face down. (You can't look at it.) {R}, Discard your hand, Sacrifice Bomat Courier: Put all cards exiled with Bomat Courier into their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Other artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The foundries of Kaladesh run like clockwork under the supervision of their formidable overseers.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Cogworker's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token. {1}{W}, Sacrifice Cogworker's Puzzleknot: Create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All skyships entering or leaving the fairgrounds must pass through the security checkpoint.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Deadlock Trap enters the battlefield tapped. When Deadlock Trap enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}: Tap target creature or planeswalker. Its activated abilities can't be activated this turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you get {E} (an energy counter). {4}, {T}: Return target creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Demolition Stomper can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Crew 5 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 5 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {U}: Dukhara Peafowl gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Elegant filigree birds perch along the eleven bridges that cross Canal Dukhara.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters). {T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Dynavolt Tower deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I like that Tezzeret. He has vision the other judges don't. He sees the potential in what we're making here." - Faiz, inventor

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Eager Construct enters the battlefield, each player may scry 1. (To scry 1, look at the top card of your library, then you may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Loyal to a fault, it anticipates its master's every need.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Electrostatic Pummeler enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay {E}{E}{E}: Electrostatic Pummeler gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is its power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever you get one or more {E} (energy counters), put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. {4}, {T}: You get {E}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Filigree Familiar enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. When Filigree Familiar dies, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's the must-have gift for everyone on your list. Get one for yourself, too!" - Chammi, curio vendor

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Fireforger's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target. {2}{R}, Sacrifice Fireforger's Puzzleknot: It deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste When Fleetwheel Cruiser enters the battlefield, it becomes an artifact creature until end of turn. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Artifact spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Automaton inspectors ensure that the Consulate's stringent standards for mass production are upheld.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Each player may play an additional land on each of their turns. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, if that player has no cards in hand, that player draws three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: This detailed model allows the edificers to examine the city from every angle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Glassblower's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, scry 2, then you get {E}{E}. (You get two energy counters. To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.) {2}{U}, Sacrifice Glassblower's Puzzleknot: Scry 2, then you get {E}{E}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+2. Whenever an Artificer enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Inventor's Goggles to it. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Haste Fabricate 1 (When this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it or create a 1/1 colorless Servo artifact creature token.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Iron League prides itself on its metal-shaping techniques.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn. Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It would be unfortunate if the key fell into the wrong hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Metalspinner's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, you draw a card and you lose 1 life. {2}{B}, Sacrifice Metalspinner's Puzzleknot: You draw a card and you lose 1 life.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total mana value of noncreature artifacts you control. Sacrifice two artifacts: Return Metalwork Colossus from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Multiform Wonder enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). Pay {E}: Multiform Wonder gains your choice of flying, vigilance, or lifelink until end of turn. Pay {E}: Multiform Wonder gets +2/-2 or -2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {G}: Narnam Cobra gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some say tales of the Narnam greenhouse are told to scare the children, but every tale grows from a seed of truth.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Trample, haste Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It'll either crash or win the race. Possibly both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If an artifact or creature entering the battlefield causes a triggered ability of a permanent you control to trigger, that ability triggers an additional time.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: All who listen hear their own song, a unique melody played just for them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Mill two cards. {2}, Exile Perpetual Timepiece: Shuffle any number of target cards from your graveyard into your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not be so caught up in keeping track of time that you forget to make use of it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {B}: Prakhata Pillar-Bug gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Not a mote of dust escapes the dutiful cleaners that keep the exclusive Prakhata Club immaculate.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Prophetic Prism enters the battlefield, draw a card. {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To understand Kaladesh, one must first understand how aether and invention flow together through the great Aether Cycle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever Renegade Freighter attacks, it gets +1/+1 and gains trample until end of turn. Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Scrapheap Scrounger can't block. {1}{B}, Exile another creature card from your graveyard: Return Scrapheap Scrounger from your graveyard to the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some machines refuse to accept their own obsolescence.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sees itself in all of its creations.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Skysovereign, Consul Flagship enters the battlefield or attacks, it deals 3 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls. Crew 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Smuggler's Copter attacks or blocks, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I did not think I would understand the cold filigree creatures of this world, but they too are governed by the laws of nature." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +2/+0. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Good morning, children. Please open your aether valves and ignite your gauntlets." - Rakib, Ghirapur schoolteacher

property.name: Rules
property.value: {R}: Weldfast Monitor gains menace until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The avant-garde among Ghirapur's inventors disregard the Consulate's safety standards completely.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {4}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Thopter artifact creature token with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Our creations are more than mere things. They have life in them, little bits of ourselves." - Saheeli Rai

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Woodweaver's Puzzleknot enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E} (three energy counters). {2}{G}, Sacrifice Woodweaver's Puzzleknot: You gain 3 life and get {E}{E}{E}.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Workshop Assistant dies, return another target artifact card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sometimes the smallest things make the biggest difference.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Aether Hub enters the battlefield, you get {E} (an energy counter). {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Pay {E}: Add one mana of any color.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It powers the dreams of Ghirapur.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Blooming Marsh enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {B} or {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A retreat to nature can inspire even the most jaded inventor.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Botanical Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Life inspires technology, which expands life's domain.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Concealed Courtyard enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {W} or {B}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Where high society and dark opportunity intersect.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Inspiring Vantage enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ghirapur is a beacon of inspiration, attracting the most brilliant minds on Kaladesh.

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control three or more artifacts, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Inventors' Fair: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Activate only if you control three or more artifacts.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add {C}. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice Sequestered Stash: Mill five cards. Then you may put an artifact card from your graveyard on top of your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Spirebluff Canal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands. {T}: Add {U} or {R}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There's so much more to Ghirapur than can be accessed by traditional roads.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+2]: Chandra, Pyrogenius deals 2 damage to each opponent. −3: Chandra, Pyrogenius deals 4 damage to target creature. −1[0]: Chandra, Pyrogenius deals 6 damage to target player or planeswalker and each creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flame Lash deals 4 damage to any target.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Liberating Combustion deals 6 damage to target creature. You may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Chandra, Pyrogenius, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Chandra planeswalker, Renegade Firebrand gets +1/+0 and has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Stone Quarry enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {R} or {W}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Inventors' Renaissance came on the heels of the Great Aether Boom, hiking demand for raw materials of every kind.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [+3]: You gain 3 life. −4: Reveal the top two cards of your library. Put all land cards from among them onto the battlefield and the rest into your hand. −12: Creatures you control get +5/+5 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) As long as you control a Nissa planeswalker, Guardian of the Great Conduit gets +2/+0 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You tread upon the land all the time, yet you seem dismayed when it moves to step on you." - Nissa Revane

property.name: Rules
property.value: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Search your library and graveyard for a card named Nissa, Nature's Artisan, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Woodland Stream enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {G} or {U}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Waterways carve their routes through the land to reflect the paths the aether streams cut through the clouds.
